application.doc: Exporting the contents of the administration pages root as a .zip file

method.name: GET
method.id: Exporting the contents of the administration pages root as a .zip file
method.doc: To export the contents of the administration pages root as a .zip file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the Administration Pages Root resource URI. Note: Redirect the output of the web service to a local file as it is not screen readable.

response.doc:
200 ok
The zipped management root file

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
